import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { AddRecipeService } from 'src/app/services/add-recipe.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-recipe1', templateUrl: './add-recipe1.page.html', styleUrls: ['./add-recipe1.page.scss'], }) export class AddRecipe1Page implements OnInit { constructor(private addrecipeService: AddRecipeService) { } ngOnInit() { } } Enrich your cookbook Turn social posts into recipes
